divs: sighting detailsi didn't see the whole thing, my brother was racing outside and saw them he raced back to his room grabbed his camera and said "ufo's!" i ran outside and me, his friends, and him saw 5 dots that were very bright. they weren't like a normal airplane with two little white lights, but they had a different color. they had the color of a street lamp. the orange\yellowish lights. they flew in and they scattered then they condensed into a a triangle. i ran inside and got my dad to come out. by the time i got back they were almost all gone. the last 2 or 3 just faded out. i think they went back into outer space. my brother got some on camera. my brother and his friends will probly have a better describtion as they got to watch more of it then me. i dont think that the pictures showed up very well so he might not post them.
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Erie
There were no other sightings in Erie on or around September 22nd 2007
Summary: 5 UFO's that came in condensed into a triangle and then faded out.
